title: Design for Woven Hanging  "Triptych Over a Blue Couch"
medium: Brush and watercolor on white paper
description: Three irregular square panels in blue and green, the middle panel with bird or other flying object, suspended from x-shaped blue cords which hang from horizontal blue support.
